resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81612</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81612</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6879</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Quiz - Timber Frame Construction & Condensation</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario – Construcción de estructuras de madera y condensación</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist – Tógáil Fráma Adhmaid agus Comhdhlúthú</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quiz - Bauholz-Feld-Aufbau U. Kondensation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu - Construction et Condensation de Trame de 
Bois de construction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz - Construção & Condensação Do Frame Da 
Madeira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz - Costruzione & Condensazione Della 
Struttura Del Legname</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων - κατασκευή & συμπύκνωση ξύλινων 
πλαισίων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will ; identify the parts of a timber frame house, know the functions of each component,  list advantages of timber frame housing, know the principles of condensation.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos identificarán las partes de una casa con estructura de madera, conocerán las funciones de cada componente, listarán las ventajas de las casas que utilizan estructura de madera, conocerán los principios de la condensación.</string>
            <string language="ga">Beidh páirteanna tí fhráma adhmaid ar eolas ag daltaí, beidh feidhmeanna gach cuid ar eolas acu, liostálfaidh siad buntáistí tithíocht fhráma adhmaid, beidh prionsabail chomhdhlúthaithe ar eolas acu.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Construction Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios de construcción</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar Foirgníochta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen werden; kennzeichnen Sie die Teile
eines Bauholzfeldhauses, kennen Sie die Funktionen jedes Bestandteils,
drucken Sie Vorteile des Bauholzfeldgehäuses aus, kennen Sie die 
Grundregeln der Kondensation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles  ; identifiez les parties 
d'une maison de trame de bois de construction, savez les fonctions de 
chaque composant, énumérez les avantages du logement de trame de 
bois de construction, savez les principes de la condensation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas ; identifique as partes de uma 
casa do frame da madeira, saiba as funções de cada componente, 
aliste vantagens da carcaça do frame da madeira, saiba os princípios
da condensação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille; identifichi le parti di una 
casa della struttura del legname, conosca le funzioni di ogni 
componente, elenchi i vantaggi dell'alloggiamento della struttura del 
legname, conosca i principii di condensazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές  προσδιορίστε τα μέρη ενός σπιτιού 
ξύλινων πλαισίων, ξέρτε τις λειτουργίες κάθε συστατικού, 
εμφανίστε λίστα τα πλεονεκτήματα της κατοικίας ξύλινων πλαισίων,
ξέρτε τις αρχές της συμπύκνωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufbau-Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études de Construction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Da Construção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Della Costruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτες κατασκευής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
